get.summary: List available ACME accounts for authorized user

parameters.name: zones
parameters.description: zones this ca is authorized to issue certificates for

parameters.name: acmecaurl
parameters.description: base url to ACME certificate authority

parameters.name: acmelicense
parameters.description: url of ACME cert authority license agreement

get.summary: Find available ACME account by account ID

put.summary: Update ACME account by account ID

parameters.name: acmecaurl
parameters.description: base url to ACME certificate authority

parameters.name: acmelicense
parameters.description: url of ACME cert authority license agreement

delete.summary: Delete ACME account by account ID

put.summary: Update ACME account registration with ACME authority by account ID

post.summary: Register ACME account with ACME authority by account ID

get.summary: List available certificates in an ACME account

post.summary: Create a new certificate in an ACME account

parameters.name: subjects
parameters.description: list of subjects for this certificate, first is CN, following are subject alternative names

items.description: sibject cn or san ex: sub.domain.com

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: optional externally generated PKCS10 certificate signing request -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----\nBASE64\n-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----

get.summary: Find certificate in accme account by ID

parameters.name: certificate_id
parameters.description: ID of certificate in this account

put.summary: Update certificate in account by ID

parameters.name: subjects
parameters.description: list of subjects for this certificate, first is CN, following are subject alternative names

items.description: sibject cn or san ex: sub.domain.com

delete.summary: Delete certificate in account by id

post.summary: Generate new key pair for certificate
post.description: Keypair generation is required if you plan to generate a certificate signing request inside certbot
This is only necessary if you did not load an externally generated CSR into the tool
You must have signing permissions for the owning account AND a valid CSR for an ACME ca to sign must be provided or generated

get.summary: Download certificate, chain, and private key PKCS12 format

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: optional password to encrypt pkcs12 file contents

get.summary: Download certificate, chain, and private key PEM encoded
Download certificate, chain, and private key PEM encoded using an existing private key hash

parameters.name: keyhash
parameters.description: MD5 hash of certs private key

get.summary: Download certificate, chain, and private key PKCS12 encoded using an existing private key hash

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: optional password to encrypt pkcs12 file contents

parameters.name: keyhash
parameters.description: MD5 hash of certs private key

get.summary: Get JSON web token by TLS client certificate authentication

post.summary: Get JSON web token by LDAP user authentication

get.summary: List available CA accounts for authorized user

parameters.name: zones
parameters.description: zones this ca is authorized to issue certificates for

parameters.name: certificate_id
parameters.description: ID number of coresponding certificate object, required for signing operations

parameters.name: crlurl
parameters.description: fully qualified url to certificate revocation list for this CA

get.summary: Find available CA account by account ID

put.summary: Update CA account by account ID

parameters.name: zones
parameters.description: zones this ca is authorized to issue certificates for

parameters.name: certificate_id
parameters.description: ID number of coresponding certificate object, required for signing operations

parameters.name: crlurl
parameters.description: fully qualified url to certificate revocation list for this CA

delete.summary: Delete CA account by account ID

get.summary: List available certificates in an CA account

post.summary: Create a new certificate in an CA account

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of certificate to issue, such as certificate authority, client authentication, or server encryption

parameters.name: subjects
parameters.description: list of subjects for this certificate, first is CN, following are subject alternative names

items.description: subject cn or san ex: sub.domain.com

get.summary: Find certificate in accme account by ID

parameters.name: certificate_id
parameters.description: ID of certificate in this account

put.summary: Update certificate in an CA account

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of certificate to issue, such as certificate authority, client authentication, or server encryption

parameters.name: subjects
parameters.description: list of subjects for this certificate, first is CN, following are subject alternative names

items.description: subject cn or san ex: sub.domain.com

delete.summary: Delete certificate in account by id

post.summary: Generate new key pair for certificate
post.description: Keypair generation is required if you plan to generate a certificate signing request inside certbot
This is only necessary if you did not load an externally generated CSR into the tool
You must have signing permissions for the owning account AND a valid CSR for a ca to sign must be provided or generated

get.summary: Download certificate, chain, and private key PKCS12 format

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: optional password to encrypt pkcs12 file contents

get.summary: Download certificate, chain, and private key PEM encoded
Download certificate, chain, and private key PEM encoded using an existing private key hash

parameters.name: keyhash
parameters.description: MD5 hash of certs private key

get.summary: Download certificate, chain, and private key PKCS12 encoded using an existing private key hash

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: optional password to encrypt pkcs12 file contents

parameters.name: keyhash
parameters.description: MD5 hash of certs private key

get.summary: Hello world test for API troubleshooting

id.description: Unique identifier for the account id

zones.description: List of zones this account is authorized to issue certificates for

acmecaurl.description: Base url of ACME certificate authority

acmelicense.description: Full url of ACME certificate authority license agreement

authtype.description: supported authentication type http or dns

authprovider.description: provider for authtype http path or dns provider

authaccount.description: account id for auth providers requiring authentication

authuser.description: username for auth providers requiring authentication

authpass.description: password for auth providers requiring authentication

status.description: status of this account, unregistered or registered

updated_at.description: Date this interaction was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the account id

subjects.description: array of at least one CN followed by subject alternative names for this certificate

expires.description: Date the current certificate expires if applicable

status.description: status of this certificate, new unsigned signed etc

updated_at.description: Date this interaction was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the account id

zones.description: List of zones this account is authorized to issue certificates

certificate_id.description: ID of CA certificate object used for signing

crlurl.description: Fully qualified URL of certificate revocation list

status.description: status of this account, not currently used for anything

updated_at.description: Date this interaction was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the account id

subjects.description: array of at least one CN followed by subject alternative names for this certificate

type.description: Type of certificate, intended use, template to use

expires.description: Date the current certificate expires if applicable

status.description: status of this certificate, new unsigned signed etc

updated_at.description: Date this interaction was last updated
